g:HTMLPanel.g:Label: You are activating R Markdown visual editing mode. This mode enables you to compose markdown using a familiar word processor style interface.
g:HTMLPanel.p: You can switch between visual and source mode at any time (editing location and undo/redo state will be preserved when you switch).

rc:HelpLink.caption: Learn more about R Markdown visual editing mode

g:HTMLPanel.p: Visual mode will re-write your markdown source code using Pandoc's default markdown writer. Click here to learn more about markdown output from visual mode.
